description: A lovely slice to have in the morning or afternoon with a cup of tea.
name: Coconut Delight Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. Preheat oven to 160 degrees fan. Grease and line a slice tray.
Melt butter and syrup in a small saucepan over low heat until butter is melted or can melt in the microwave. Set aside to cool. Once cooled add vanilla and mix well.
Sift flour and cocoa into a large bowl, add Weet Bix, coconut and sugar. Mix well to combine.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix well.
Press mixture into a greased and lined slice tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until skewer comes out clean. Different Ovens have differing cooking times.
Cool on a wire rack, ice when cooled.
Icing: In a medium bowl, beat butter until pale, carefully add icing sugar, cocoa if using, almond extract if using, mix well. Ice and add your preferred decorations.
